video.title: Team Toon
video.synopsis: Discovering that the "Psycho Squirrel" cartoon characters they draw can come to life, four friends pit their superheroes against a host of villains.

episodes.synopsis: It's nearly time for Hutchinson's homecoming game, but when the star basketball player disappears, Team Toon starts a missing MVP investigation.
episodes.title: Game Time

episodes.synopsis: Sam has a big smile all ready for picture day, but when his tooth falls out and disappears, the team must find the tooth and fight a slime monster.
episodes.title: Tooth Fairy

episodes.synopsis: Iko loses his notebook of story ideas in Hutchinson's pool drain, so Team Toon goes on an underwater quest to find the notes and save Psycho Squirrel.
episodes.title: Swim Fan

episodes.synopsis: Sam is starring as a turkey in the school play, but his costume isn't in his locker! Can Team Toon find the feathered costume before opening night?
episodes.title: The Turkey

episodes.synopsis: Team Toon hears spooky laughter behind a locked door at school. Curiosity takes hold and they try to uncover what's funny inside the "secret room."
episodes.title: The Secret Room

episodes.synopsis: It's lunchtime, and all the food in the cafeteria is frozen. Now the team must solve this cool mystery before they all freeze, too.
episodes.title: Frozen Peas

episodes.synopsis: A rival webisode called Insanity Gopher steals Team Toon's cartoon thunder, but when the critter goes crazy, its creators come to Team Toon for help.
episodes.title: Rival Webisode

episodes.synopsis: Poor Iko's gym clothes turned pink in the wash and his regular clothes are gone; hopefully, the team can find them before his face turns red.
episodes.title: Pink Gym Uniform

episodes.synopsis: Ash finds strange red foil in her desk and Dylan is sure it's a sign of alien invasion. However, the team soon discovers its source is very human.
episodes.title: V Day

episodes.synopsis: The team's all ready to enjoy some tasty soda, but the cups have no bottoms! Will Dylan and the gang find the thief and quench their thirst?
episodes.title: The Hole in the Cup

episodes.synopsis: Dylan's crush loses her hamster on Show and Tell day, so he and the team search all over Hutchinson for her pet -- and the way to win her heart.
episodes.title: Show and Tell

episodes.synopsis: Dylan's cool new video game is missing and was swapped out for a preschool game! The gang must go back in time to find it and protect his high score.
episodes.title: Power Flower Counting

episodes.synopsis: Sam's all set to face off with his chess rival, Boris, when he realizes one of his game pieces is gone. Can Team Toon find it before he has to forfeit?
episodes.title: Chess

episodes.synopsis: The team is horrified when Ash makes friends with school bully Rebecca Riker. Dylon, Iko and Sam must find a way to tell Ash her new pal is trouble.
episodes.title: Frenemies

episodes.synopsis: Broccoli-allergic Timmy breaks out in hives when the offending vegetable is left on the broccoli-free table. Dylan suspects foul food play.
episodes.title: No Broccoli Allowed

episodes.synopsis: A tiny hair on Iko's upper lip makes Dylan think his friend is becoming a werewolf, so Team Toon steps in to stop their pal's "hairy" transformation.
episodes.title: Dog Days

episodes.synopsis: Science teacher Miss Faltine tells Team Toon the class skeleton is missing, so Team Toon helps their timid teacher track down the bony mascot.
episodes.title: Missing Skeleton

episodes.synopsis: When Iko is framed for cheating on a test, Team Toon is drawn into a strange hunt for a mysterious figure known only as "the kid with the beard."
episodes.title: The Kid with the Beard

episodes.synopsis: Just as Dylan goes on a spy novel kick, a strange villainess plots to detonate a stink bomb at school. The team rushes in before things explode.
episodes.title: Spy Girl

episodes.synopsis: A mad scientist with a suspicious bag threatens to disrupt Hutchinson's Safety Day school assembly and the gang fears a horrible monster is inside.
episodes.title: Safety Day

episodes.synopsis: Hutchinson students are planning a time capsule. When Psycho Squirrel disappears, the team fears their pal might be locked up for a long, long time!
episodes.title: Time Capsule

episodes.synopsis: When Sam's unpopular rival, Cornelia Flynn, is elected school president, everything falls apart. Can the team save Hutchinson from Cornelia's chaos?
episodes.title: Election

episodes.synopsis: Ash's foul mood transforms her into a furious monster. Now, the rest of Team Toon must find a way to calm her down before she tears the school apart.
episodes.title: Ash Angry

episodes.synopsis: New student Blaze is so hip he lures Ash and Sam away from Team Toon, until Dylan figures out how to fight cool with cool and win his friends back.
episodes.title: Too Cool for Toons

episodes.synopsis: When Sam's big stunt man job takes over his life, he misses Ash's birthday party and upsets Team Toon. Dylan tries to help him see what's important.
episodes.title: Sam the Daredevil

episodes.synopsis: After their Psycho Squirrel cartoon gets a negative comment online, the gang's squabbles get in the way of helping Wendell find his imaginary friend.
episodes.title: Creative Differences
